title: CVBuilder
description: Create your professional CV in a few simple steps

landing.title: Create your professional CV in a few clicks
landing.subtitle: A simple and intuitive tool to create a CV that represents you. Follow our guided steps and get a professional CV in minutes.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Start with the basics: your contact details and essential information

education.title: Education
education.description: Highlight your academic background and degrees

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Detail your professional experiences and achievements

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Indicate the languages you master and your level

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: List your technical and professional skills

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Present your personal and professional projects

validation.futureDate: Date cannot be in the future
validation.endDateBeforeStart: End date must be after start date

confirmations.reset: Are you sure you want to reset the form? All data will be lost.
confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
confirmations.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to leave?
